attributes.action: give money to third world countries to help them through the poverty they suffer from! why should we sit here with all this money spending it on inapropriate stuff like new olimpic stadiums wen the money for that can do so much more than just build a stadium it can save lives!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: You need to add details to your petition and create a clearer call-to-action in the title
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
